meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like a blimp.
meanings.sent1: Her blimpishness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The blimpishness of the inflatable balloon was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The blimpishness of the situation was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent4: His blimpishness filled the room, dominating the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The blimpishness of the blimp floating in the sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being pompous or arrogant.
meanings.sent1: His blimpishness annoyed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The blimpishness of his attitude was off-putting.
meanings.sent3: Despite his blimpishness, he was actually quite funny.
meanings.sent4: Her blimpishness was like a shield, protecting her from criticism.
meanings.sent5: The blimpishness of the CEO was evident in every decision he made.
